Detailed Description

Defines a 32-bit packed ID for uniquely identifying hits and detector components.

Note:
Represents an ID in the detector with a raw, 32-bit value which can be unpacked into a list of field values or packed from a list of field values.

void ldmx::DetectorID::init ( ) [protected]

Reinitialize the ID in case the field list changed. This is called automatically by setFieldList. Function should be called by a subclass if a new field list is set outside that method or if new fields are added to the existing list.

Definition at line 83 of file DetectorID.cxx.

        // Fill map of name to field info.
        fieldMap_.clear();
        for (IDField::IDFieldList::iterator it = fieldList_->begin(); it != fieldList_->end(); it++) {
            fieldMap_[(*it)->getFieldName()] = *it;
        }

        // Resize array to hold the correct number of field values.
        this->fieldValues_.resize(fieldList_->size());
    }
DetectorID::RawValue ldmx::DetectorID::pack ( )

Pack the current list of field values into a raw value.

Returns:
The packed ID.

Definition at line 40 of file DetectorID.cxx.

References fieldList_, fieldValues_, ldmx::IDField::getIndex(), ldmx::IDField::getStartBit(), and rawValue_.

Referenced by ldmx::TrackerSD::ProcessHits(), ldmx::EcalSD::ProcessHits(), and ldmx::CalorimeterSD::ProcessHits().

                                        {
        rawValue_ = 0;
        for (IDField::IDFieldList::iterator it = fieldList_->begin();
                it != fieldList_->end(); it++) {
            IDField* field = (*it);
            unsigned fieldValue = fieldValues_[field->getIndex()];
            rawValue_ = rawValue_ | (fieldValue << field->getStartBit());
        }
        return rawValue_;
    }

const DetectorID::FieldValueList & ldmx::DetectorID::unpack ( )

Unpack the current raw value into a list.

Returns:
The list of unpacked values.

Definition at line 29 of file DetectorID.cxx.

References fieldList_, fieldValues_, ldmx::IDField::getBitMask(), ldmx::IDField::getIndex(), ldmx::IDField::getStartBit(), and rawValue_.

Referenced by ldmx::EcalHitIO::writeHitsCollection().

                                                       {
        std::fill(fieldValues_.begin(), fieldValues_.end(), 0);
        for (IDField::IDFieldList::iterator it = fieldList_->begin();
                it != fieldList_->end(); it++) {
            IDField* field = (*it);
            unsigned result = (field->getBitMask() & rawValue_) >> field->getStartBit();
            this->fieldValues_[field->getIndex()] = result;
        }
        return this->fieldValues_;
    }
